${ModID}:FatalStrikesQuest.TITLE: Fatal Strikes
${ModID}:FatalStrikesQuest.DESCRIPTION: Kill #b5 non-minion enemies with a #yStarter #yStrike in Act 2.
${ModID}:FatalStrikesQuest.AUTHOR: Quorry
${ModID}:FatalStrikesQuest.REWARD: Convert your #yStrikes into #yLabor #yStrikes that do more damage and gain gold on Fatal.
TRACKER_TEXT: Get Fatal with Strikes in Act 2
